strategy: The DeepCrawlerAgent will execute targeted searches using the provided keywords to map the FinTech industry's competitive landscape. The strategy will prioritize recent data (last 6-12 months) from financial news outlets, industry analysis reports, and corporate press releases. Emphasis will be placed on identifying market leaders, their current market share, strategic partnerships, M&A activities, and competitive pricing dynamics. The agent will also look for indicators of competitive intensity such as aggressive marketing campaigns, technology innovation races, and new product launches by key players. Data collection will aim to gather quantifiable metrics where possible, such as transaction volumes, customer growth, and revenue figures of major competitors, to feed into a comprehensive market analysis by the agentic AI.
